title: Stevenrail the only train service-incurring losses

content.description:
Stevenrail, the only provider of train service operating between two cities, is currently incurring economic losses.

Using a correctly labeled graph, show each of the following.

Stevenrail's loss-minimizing price and quantity, labeled Pm and Qm respectively

The area of economic losses, shaded completely

The allocatively efficient quantity, labeled Qe

If Stevenrail raised the price above Pm identified in part (a)(i), would total revenue increase, decrease, or not change? Explain.

Assume a per-unit subsidy is provided to Stevenrail.

Will Stevenrail's quantity increase, decrease, or not change? Explain.

Will consumer surplus increase, decrease, or not change?

Assume instead that a lump-sum subsidy is provided to Steverail. For the short run, answer the following.

Will the deadweight loss increase, decrease, or not change? Explain

Will Steverail's economic losses increase, decrease, or not change?
content.question: Respond to all parts of the question.

frqParts.text: Respond to all parts of the question.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
